meanings: train sb to be one's successor

vlive.korean: [빨간마스크 후계자로 낙점됐거든요] - 웃겨 - 웃긴데? [I was chosen as the next joker] - It's funny. - It's funny. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [iKON] 이 박사님들 깜찍학 박사 맞아요 무조건 맞아요 👨‍🎓 (JAY&BOBBY playing with swimming goggles)
vlive.english: [I was chosen as the next joker] - It's funny. - It's funny.

vlive.korean: 후계자로 어때요? What about him being as your successor? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 스페셜시즌 EP 29_불운 왕좌의 게임 박광VS롸저!
vlive.english: What about him being as your successor?

vlive.korean: 쟤 내 후계자다 - 소연이! 우기야 끝까지! She is my successor. - Soyeon! Yuqi! 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 41회(여자)아이들 미연CAM - 소연이를 이겨라 ①
vlive.english: She is my successor. - Soyeon! Yuqi!

vlive.korean: 어어 영자누님 후계자답지 않은데? Oh?? It's not the Youngja student that I knew? 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : 학과 동기랑,, 뽀뽀를? [#좋맛탱] EP03 내 마음 속에 퐁당, 쇼콜라
vlive.english: Oh?? It's not the Youngja student that I knew?

vlive.korean: 발라드의 후계자니까... I'm the successor of ballad. 듣기 View video JYPnation : FUN MELODY NIGHT - 백아연, 박재정, 에디킴, 조정치

examples.korean: Her duty was to produce an heir to the throne. 발음듣기 그녀의 의무는 왕위를 이을 후계자를 낳는[생산하는] 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her duty was to produce an heir to the throne. 발음

examples.korean: We are the inheritors of a great cultural tradition. 발음듣기 우리는 위대한 문화유산의 후계자이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We are the inheritors of a great cultural tradition. 발음

examples.korean: She is widely regarded as the current leader’s natural successor. 발음듣기 그녀는 현 지도자의 자연스러운 후계자로 널리 평가받고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is widely regarded as the current leader’s natural successor. 발음

examples.korean: the president’s political heirs 발음듣기 대통령의 정치적 후계자들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The king's heir suddenly died yesterday. 발음듣기 어제 갑자기 왕의 후계자가 죽었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The king's heir suddenly died yesterday. 발음
